name: vetchium-monorepo
description: Vetchium monorepo - manages git hooks and repo-wide tooling

scripts.format:go:check: sh -c 'OUTPUT=$(git ls-files "*.go" | xargs goimports -l); if [ -n "$OUTPUT" ]; then echo "$OUTPUT"; exit 1; fi'
scripts.format: bun run format:prettier && bun run format:go
scripts.format:check: bun run format:prettier:check && bun run format:go:check
